author: Staff Reporter
text:
A one-and-a-half-year-old boy was killed in an accident at Palacodde near here on Tuesday. The boy, Pradeep, was on a two-wheeler with his mother Salammal (30), when a tractor knocked down their vehicle. Pradeep was killed on the spot, while Salammal has been admitted to Dharmapuri Medical College Hospital.

Body found

The body of an unidentified man was found near a private showroom at Maarandahalli near here on Wednesday.

While the police are yet to ascertain his identity, preliminary inquires revealed that the man was found in an inebriated condition for the last three days near a TASMAC shop in the vicinity. The body has been sent to government hospital for post mortem examination.

Bodies recovered

The bodies of two men, who drowned in a coracle capsize on Sunday, were recovered from Dargah Lake, two days later.

Babu (28) and Regan alias Rajashekar (26) had taken a joyride along with three other friends on a fishing coracle at the lake, when the coracle capsized.

While their friends were rescued by the locals in the vicinity, Babu and Regan went missing and were feared drowned. Regan’s body was recovered on Tuesday night, while Babu’s body was found on Wednesday morning.
title: Boy killed in road accident
